name: Beluga Squish!
description:
It's Beluga Squish! Click and drag the beluga's head to squish it! Help the beluga avoid the hands! These hands are not allowed to touch the beluga! Your hands are allowed to touch the beluga, of course.

Do not feel gloomy if you fail! The beluga is OK. You can try again as many times as you need to.

This is a small game that I created to test the Gamemaker Studio 2 HTML5 export module. It's really only playable with a computer mouse or tablet pen; the game has no controller support (though I can imagine how I could implement this) and I imagine you may have some difficulties with a laptop trackpad.
